channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Paramount makes a $108 billion hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount has been none too pleased about Netflix striking an $82.7 billion deal to buy much of Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD). Now, Paramount is making a hostile takeover bid for WBD. It's making its pitch directly to WBD shareholders with an all-cash offer of $30 per share that expires on January 8.Late last week, the WBD board unanimously accepted Netflix's offer of $27.75 per share. That breaks down to $23.25 per share in cash and another $4.50 per share in Netflix stock. Netflix's overall bid is valued at $82.7 billion, while Paramount's totals $108.4 billion. There's a key difference when ...

item.title: Une loi qui a couté 100 millions d’euros aux Français ? De quoi se plaint vraiment Amazon ?
item.description: Deux ans après la loi sur les frais de port obligatoires sur les livres, Amazon publie ce lundi 8 décembre 2025 une tribune, dans laquelle il déplore le bilan jugé catastrophique de cette mesure. Celle-ci aurait coûté plus de 100 millions d'euros aux Français, selon le géant du commerce en ligne.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s disabled ad-like app promotions in ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI has turned off some promotional app messages in ChatGPT after users complained that the chatbot was showing them ads. In a post on X, OpenAI's chief research officer, Mark Chen, said that the company is working to improve the experience after showing ChatGPT users in-app messages promoting companies like Peloton and Target, and that […]

item.title: Self-healing IT is no longer science fiction – It’s driving businesses forward
item.description: Agentic AI is shifting IT from reactive firefighting to proactive, autonomous system resilience.

item.title: The Boys is returning for its final season in April
item.description: The Boys' fifth and final season is headed to Amazon Prime Video on April 8th, 2026. In addition to a release date, Prime Video revealed the trailer for season five during CCXP in Brazil, offering a look at the reunion between Supernatural co-stars Jared Padalecki and Jensen Ackles, as reported earlier by Variety. The Boys […]

item.title: Paramount goes to war with Netflix for Warner Bros. Discovery with hostile $108.4B bid
item.description: Paramount Skydance on Monday launched a hostile, $108.4 billion bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, days after Warner Bros. agreed to be acquired by Netflix for $82.7 billion.

item.title: Gartner advisory states AI browsers are NOT your friend — and they are putting your business at risk
item.description: AI browsers pose a threat to data protection, financial information, and security postures.

item.title: Netflix-Warner : vous n’avez rien suivi ? voici notre foire aux questions sur le deal qui chamboule le cinéma et la SVoD
item.description: S'il y a des personnes qui ont passé la dernière semaine sous un rocher, ou qui se sont simplement coupées de l'actualité, sachez que Netflix a annoncé l'acquisition de Warner Bros. Cette fusion de deux titans de l'audiovisuel pose beaucoup de questions auxquelles nous apportons les réponses ici.

item.title: In 2026, sustainability is the new stack
item.description: Make 2026 the year sustainably ceases to be a burden, and instead becomes an advantage.

item.title: Netflix n’a pas encore racheté Warner Bros : son rival Paramount fait une offre folle
item.description: La bataille autour de Warner Bros. Discovery repart de plus belle. Après avoir été doublé par Netflix, Paramount Skydance revient à la charge avec une contre-offre à 108,4 milliards de dollars.

item.title: The FBI is hunting for 'unjammable' drones – and these flying cameras use one very old-school trick to stop remote attacks
item.description: The FBI wants information from companies who can supply drones which use fixed optic fiber connections.

item.description: The Google Pixel 9a drops to the lowest-ever price of $349 at Amazon

item.description: Today, I’m talking with Willem Avé, who’s head of product at Square. You know Square — it was started by billionaire Jack Dorsey, of Twitter fame, more than 15 years ago, and it got big on the back of that little magnetic reader that plugged into the headphone jack of the iPhone and let small […]

item.title: The Honor Magic 8 Lite has the best battery life of any phone I've ever tested – but it's not a total home run
item.description: The Honor Magic 8 Lite boasts some of the best battery life on the market, but it's let down by middling cameras and average performance.

item.title: IBM to acquire Confluent for $11B as it seeks to bolster its data offerings
item.description: IBM is buying data infrastructure company Confluent for $11 billion in cash in a bid to to bolster its data and automation products as ever more companies move their tech operations to the cloud and deploy AI technology.

item.title: Ultimate Ears Wonderboom Play : cette enceinte Bluetooth est en promo à -44 %
item.description: Celles et ceux qui cherchent une petite enceinte puissante et bien résistante pourront se tourner vers la Wonderboom Play d'Ultimate Ears. En plus, elle est en promo et coûte 49,99 euros au lieu de 89,99 euros sur fnac.com.

item.title: « Je n’ai jamais vu une telle fluidité » : la dernière mise à jour des Pixel semblent faire des miracles
item.description: Les détenteurs d'un smartphone Pixel commencent à recevoir la mise à jour de décembre 2025 et les premiers retours sont très enthousiastes.

item.title: I'm a marathon runner and these are the running gifts I wish someone would buy me, plus the ones I'd give to new starters
item.description: From top-tier running socks to training and recovery accessories, these are 12 running gifts sporty people will be glad to get.

item.title: « Risques de blessures » : ne roulez plus avec ces vélos vendus chez Décathlon et Nature & Découvertes
item.description: Un rappel national touche des vélos-cargos vendus depuis plusieurs années chez Décathlon et Nature & Découvertes. Une anomalie détectée sur la fourche pourrait entraîner un risque de blessures.

item.title: Paramount launches a hostile $108 billion bid to snatch Warner from Netflix
item.description: Paramount has launched a $108.4 billion hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, calling Netflix's $83 billion arrangement to purchase the entertainment giant's studios and streaming service "inferior." The Paramount proposal, unlike Netflix's, would also include the linear networks owned by WBD. Paramount says its deal offers a "superior alternative to the Netflix transaction," citing […]...

item.title: Votre clavier Xiaomi s’ouvre tout seul ? La marque confirme un virus sur ce smartphone phare
item.description: Un malware sournois cible spécifiquement le Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G. Si votre clavier apparaît sans raison ou que des pubs surgissent, ne cherchez plus : c'est une infection. Voici comment nettoyer votre mobile.

item.title: FBI warns of kidnapping scams as hackers turn to AI to provide 'proof of life'
item.description: AI-generated deepfake videos are being used as "proof" someone was kidnapped.

item.title: Blink budget security cameras will support AI-powered video descriptions
item.description: Amazon's budget Blink smart home brand is adding AI-generated video descriptions as a new benefit for subscribers. Blink Video Descriptions are text descriptions of the motion doorbells and cameras capture, and they’ll be available in beta starting today, November 17.Not unlike Ring Video Descriptions, a feature offered on Amazon's other smart home brand, Blink's AI-generated descriptions are supposed to be a concise way to check out what's happening in and around your home. Any kind of motion can produce a video clip and a notification in the Blink app, but video descriptions should help weed...

item.title: AI could transform the physical world. To do so, it will need human expertise
item.description: Humans are a crucial element in the design and implementation of things like self-driving vehicles, which use AI to navigate the real world. The robots won’t be replacing us, but we will increasingly be working side-by-side with artificial intelligence tools that can then learn from our human expertise.

item.title: Netflix is buying Warner Bros: All of the latest updates
item.description: After a bidding war that reportedly also involved Paramount, Comcast, Amazon, and Apple, on December 5th, Netflix struck a deal to buy Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion, buying the studio, HBO / HBO Max, Warner Games, and more, while leaving cable and sports assets, including CNN, TNT Sports, and the Discovery channels out. A few […]

item.title: Coup de théâtre, Paramount annonce son projet de rachat de Warner Bros, contre Netflix
item.description: C'est officiel, Paramount veut aussi racheter Warner Bros et faire capoter le plan de Netflix.

item.title: The Google Pixel Watch 4 is cheaper than ever right now
item.description:
Cyber Monday has come and gone, but you can still get a great deal on a smartwatch with the Google Pixel Watch 4 marked down to $300 from $350. At almost 15 percent off, this is the lowest we've ever seen it.
The Pixel Watch 4 was just released in October and is our smartwatch of choice for users with Pixel phones. In our hands-on review we scored it 86 out of 100, taking note of its fast recharge time, health and fitness tracking, repairable design and gorgeous display. The curved display sits under a domed glass cover and sports an impressive 3,000 nits of peak brightness, well beyond the...

item.title: OpenAI walks back ad-like app suggestions in ChatGPT, saying it "fell short" and will improve controls
item.description: OpenAI quietly disables ad-like app suggestions in ChatGPT after backlash over unclear promotion.

item.title: 01net Awards : la meilleure voiture électrique de l’année est…
item.description: La rédaction de 01net.com désigne les meilleurs produits de l’année. Découvrez tous les jours les vainqueurs de chaque catégorie jusqu’à la remise des prix le 10 décembre, en live s’il vous plait !

item.title: ‘Andor’ Snubbed For Best Drama in Tight Genre Golden Globes Race
item.description: 'Severance' and 'Pluribus' did get Best Drama nominations, as did 'Sinners' and 'Frankenstein'.

item.title: Segway’s new Myon e-bike will straddle past and future
item.description: Segway's modest e-bike lineup is about to gain a new entrant. The Ninebot-owned brand, once known for its pioneering self-balancing scooters, currently only sells two e-bikes: the moto-styled Xyber and the low-step Xafari. Now it's getting a third, Myon, which it plans on officially debuting at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas next year. […]...

item.title: What is the release date for The Mighty Nein episode 6 on Prime Video?
item.description: Here's when The Mighty Nein episode 6 will make its bow on Prime Video.

item.title: Adobe Rolls Out Free Generative AI for Creative Cloud Pro Users as a Limited-Time Bonus
item.description: Over 20 AI-enhanced apps and tools, including unlimited Firefly and 3rd-party image generations, make Adobe the industry leader.

item.title: La Xbox se vend si mal qu’elle se fait battre par une console que vous ne connaissez pas
item.description: Connaissez-vous la console NEX Playground ? Nous non plus. Lors du Black Friday, elle s'est mieux vendue que les Xbox de Microsoft.

item.title: Boulanger met enfin en promo l’Apple Watch Series 11, juste à temps pour finir sous le sapin
item.description: Pour les personnes à la recherche d'une première Apple Watch à la pointe sur le suivi de santé, l'Apple Watch Series 11 est la référence ! Et pour cette fin d'année, elle se négocie en promotion à 419 euros contre 449 euros à son lancement.

item.title: Adobe launches content creation hub in Premiere mobile for YouTube Shorts creators
item.description: The company says the space is designed to give creators everything they need to produce viral videos, grow their audience, and tap into trends, whether it's creating day-in-the-life vlogs, travel videos, or behind-the-scenes clips.

item.title: React2Shell RCE flaw exploited by Chinese hackers hours after disclosure
item.description: Chinese hackers are taking advantage of the 10/10 bug reported late last week.

item.title: « Un taux de panne extrêmement élevé et une durée de vie plus courte » : ces batteries Tesla produites en Chine pointées du doigt
item.description: Tesla équipe certaines de ses voitures électriques vendues en Europe de batteries fournies par LG. Problème, ces dernières affichent une fiabilité très moyenne, avec un taux de dégradation particulièrement élevé.

item.title: Trump says the big Netflix-Warner Bros merger ‘could be a problem’ – here’s why
item.description: ‘Could be a problem’: Trump wants to personally help decide the Netflix-Warner Bros. Deal – and he’s already highlighted a big reason to block it.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros : Donald Trump met en garde Netflix
item.description: Donald Trump a l'intention de jouer un rôle dans le rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix. Le président a estimé que la fusion « pourrait être un problème après avoir reçu Ted Sarandos, l'un des PDG de Netflix, à la Maison Blanche. C'est un signal clair que le rachat s'annonce semé d'embûches…
